mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ds_newaddcus ( city_name, platformid,storeno,store_name, pay_count, new_count, total_count, pay_20_count, new_20_count,new_10_count,pay_10_count, year,month,createtime ) VALUES( #{city_name},#{platformid},#{storeno},#{store_name},#{pay_count},#{new_count}, #{total_count},#{pay_20_count},#{new_20_count},#{new_10_count},#{pay_10_count}, YEAR(date_sub(now(),interval 1 day)), MONTH(date_sub(now(),interval 1 day)), NOW() )
mapper.delete: delete from ds_newaddcus where year =#{year} and month =#{month}
mapper.select: select ifnull(sum(new_20_count),0) as newaddsum,count(*) as totalcount from ( select city_name, platformid, IFNULL(storeno,'') AS storeno, store_name, pay_count, new_count, total_count, pay_20_count, new_20_count, new_10_count, pay_10_count, date_format(createtime,'%Y-%m-%d %h:%i') as createtime from ds_newaddcus where year =#{year} and month =#{month} and storeno IN (${storeids})) newaddsumline
